titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER of Detention pending trial as to defendant Richard R. Conway, Jr. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken. (JAE, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Conway
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting in part 16 Motion For Extension of Filing Pretrial Motions as to Richard R. Conway Jr. The deadline for filing pretrial motions is extended to November 10, 2008. Defendant is ordered to file a waiver of speedy trial as soon as practicable. The time between October 27, 2008 and November 10, 2008, shall be deemed excludable time in any computation of time under the requirement of the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. ( MLF, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Conway
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER sustaining 42 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture. Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n)(1).The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by the United States in its secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed as to Richard R. Conway Jr. (1) Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)( PCV, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER sustaining 42 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture. Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n)(1).The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by the United States in its secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed as to Richard R. Conway Jr. (1) Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)( PCV, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Conway
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE sustaining 53 Motion for Final Forfeiture as to Richard R. Conway Jr. (1). All right, title and interest in and to the Smith and Wesson handgun, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The Smith and Wesson handgun, be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)(MKR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE sustaining 53 Motion for Final Forfeiture as to Richard R. Conway Jr. (1). All right, title and interest in and to the Smith and Wesson handgun, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The Smith and Wesson handgun, be, and the same hereby is, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)(MKR)
